description: The trap that is generated when the system temperature
exceeds a certain threshold.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'System overtemperature detected' : (($v1==2) ? 'System overtemperature cleared' : 'System overtemperature detection not supported')

description: This object indicates the current overtemperature
status for the system. If the system does not support
overtemperature detection, this object returns
notSupported.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSystemOvertemperature

description: The trap that is generated when a power supply unit
fails.
The unique index of the power supply identified by this
entry.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsPowerSupplyStatusIndex

description: This object represents the power supply status. The
value is a sum. It initially takes on the value 0, then
for each failure type which is active, 2 raised to a power
is added to the sum. The powers are according to the
following table:
Failure Type Power
AC Failure 0
Plus 5 Failure 1
Plus 12 Failure 2
Over Temperature Failure 3
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsPowerSupplyStatus

description: This object represents the various power supply failure
types which are supported. The value is a sum. It
initially takes on the value 0, then for each failure type
which is supported, 2 raised to a power is added to the
sum. The powers are according to the following table:
Failure Type Power
AC Failure 0
Plus 5 Failure 1
Plus 12 Failure 2
Over Temperature Failure 3
This object used in conjunction with the
lpsPowerSupplyStatus object for a given power supply
provide a complete picture of the status of the power
supply.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsPowerSupplyStatusSupported

description: The trap that is generated when the temperature of a
board in a particular slot exceeds a certain threshold.

Summary.eval: ($v5==1) ? '$v2 overtemperature detected' : (($v5==2) ? '$v2 overtemperature cleared' : '$v2 overtemperature not supported')

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsChassisSlotOverTemperatureEvent LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotIndex i 9999 LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardType i 1 LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardRevision s E LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardStatus i 1 LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotOvertemperature i 1

description: The index of the slot identified by this entry.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotIndex

description: The type of board residing in the slot identified by
this entry.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardType

description: The revision number of the board in the slot identified
by this entry. If the slot is empty, or the revision is
unknown this object returns a zero length string.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardRevision

description: The status of the board in the slot identified by this
entry.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardStatus

description: This object indicates the current overtemperature status
for the slot. If the slot does not support overtemperature
detection, this object returns notSupported.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotOvertemperature

description: The trap that is generated when a board is inserted into a
particular slot.
The index of the slot identified by this entry.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotIndex

description: The type of board residing in the slot identified by
this entry.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardType

description: The revision number of the board in the slot identified
by this entry. If the slot is empty, or the revision is
unknown this object returns a zero length string.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotBoardRevision

description: The trap that is generated when a board is extracted
from a particular slot.
The index of the slot identified by this entry.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSlotIndex

description: The trap that is generated when the number of addresses
stored in the bridge reaches lpsBridgeAddressThreshold.
The index of the bridge identified by this entry
relative to this agent.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsBridgeIndex

description: The trap that is generated when one of the system fans
fails.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'System fan failure detected' : (($v1==2) ? 'System fan failure cleared' : 'System fan failure detection not supported')

description: This object indicates the current fan status for the
system. If the system does not support fan failure
detection, this object returns notSupported.
variables.name: LANPLEX-SYSTEMS-MIB-1-2-2::lpsSystemFanFailure
